message.content: The chalk line tool, comprising a case, string, reel, and colored chalk powder, is crucial for marking long, straight lines on surfaces in construction, flooring, and woodworking tasks. It operates by stretching a chalk-soaked string across a surface and snapping it to leave a visible line, essential for accurate layouts and alignment in various projects. Unlike complex modern tools, the chalk line is simple, needing no power to function, and can use different colored chalks for visibility on various surfaces. Its versatility
